meanings.sent2: The rigorousnesses of the exam made it challenging for the students.
meanings.sent3: The rigorousnesses of the workout left her feeling accomplished.
meanings.sent4: The rigorousnesses of the investigation uncovered the truth.
meanings.sent5: He approached his work with the rigorousnesses needed to succeed.
